wikipedia_page.main: Philip George Edwards (6 December 1906 – 3 April 1987) was an English first-class cricketer active 1930–33 who played for Middlesex. He was born in Hoxton; died in Hampstead.

response: Philip Duncan Edwards (born 16 April 1984) is an English former professional cricketer. He was born at Minster on the Isle of Sheppey in Kent in 1984.Philip Edwards, CricInfo. Retrieved 2017-06-03.
